title: FF! Doc | PasswordGeneratorPipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

PasswordHashPipe
PasswordGeneratorPipe
PipesTranslator
Generates a random password.
See also
Github - PasswordGeneratorPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.PasswordGeneratorPipe
Syntax
Copy
<PasswordGeneratorPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
useSecureRandom	boolean	true
Whether the secureRandom algorithm is used.
lCharacters	text	('a'..'z')
The lowercase characters to use.
uCharacters	text	('A'..'Z')
The uppercase characters to use.
numbers	text	('0'..'9')
The numbers to use.
signs	text	(;:_%$#@!><)
The signs to use.
numOfLCharacters	number	2
The number of lowercase characters in the generated password.
numOfDigits	number	2
The number of digits in the generated p
